item.description:
The Connecticut Chapters of The John Birch Society & the Connecticut Oath Keepers are hosting an Agenda 21 "Brainstorming Session." While we have made excellent inroads fighting Agenda 21 in Connecticut, we need to be better organized. If you are a freedom activist or want to be one, please attend this important meeting to promote freedom in Connecticut. Come prepared to express your personal experiences and suggestions. The promoters of Agenda 21 are very well organized. If you hope to defeat one of the greatest threats to our freedom, please make sure to attend this event. Hal Shurtleff the Regional Field Director of The John Birch Society & John Beidler of Connecticut Oath Keepers will serve as the moderators. We will have literature tables with books, DVDâ€™s and handouts on Agenda 21.


AGENDA 21 SEMINAR & WORKSHOP !

Saturday, November 17, 2012 10:00 AM - 1:00 PM

Holiday Inn Express

120 Laning Street

Southington, CT 06489

Admission: $5:00

Sponsored by Connecticut Oath Keepers &

The John Birch Society

Admission $5.00

For more information, contact John Beidler

203-808-2143

ctok@cox.net

or

Kip Webster

973-934-1775



KWebster@JBS.org

Hal Shurtleff was born and raised in Boston, MA. He served nine years in the U.S. Army and Army Reserve. Hal joined The John Birch Society in 1988, and started a local chapter in 1989. He came on the staff of The JBS in 1990. Hal was appointed as a JBS Regional Field Director in 2000. He has appeared as a guest on numerous television and radio shows, & as a speaker at patriotic and civic organizations. Hal is a well sought after speaker on Agenda 21.

John Beidler has been active in many liberty groups in Connecticut for a number of years. He is the State Chapter President of Oath Keepers, a proud member of The John Birch Society and the Constitution Lobby, & Treasurer of the Connecticut Citizens Defense League. John believes that the most effective means we have to fulfill our obligations as United States citizens, is to stand-up, speak-up, step-up and get involved with like-minded patriots who support the tenets of the Declaration of Independence, the U.S. Constitution & the Bill of Rights
item.name: Agenda 21 Seminar and Workshop
